c74object.name: fluid.kmeans~

div.p: Uses the K-Means algorithm to learn clusters from a fluid.dataset~

c74object.discussion:
Open the Overview Patch
fluid.kmeans~ is part of the Fluid Decomposition Toolkit of the FluCoMa project. For more explanations, learning material, and discussions on its musicianly uses, visit flucoma.org.

method.name: reset
method.digest: Return the object to its original state
method.description: Calling reset will change parameter values back to those the object was created with, i.e. any attribute values set in the box will be retained

div.p: Identify numClusters clusters in a fluid.dataset~. It will optimise until no improvement is possible, or up to maxIter, whichever comes first. Subsequent calls will continue training from the stopping point with the same conditions.

ul.li:
dataSet:
A fluid.dataset~ of data points.

div.p: Given a trained object, return the cluster ID for each data point in a fluid.dataset~ to a fluid.labelset~.

ul.li:
dataSet:
A fluid.dataset~ containing the data to predict.

labelSet:
A fluid.labelset~ to retrieve the predicted clusters.

div.p: Given a trained object, return for each item of a provided fluid.dataset~ its distance to each cluster as an array, often reffered to as the cluster-distance space.

ul.li:
srcDataSet:
A fluid.dataset~ containing the data to transform.

dstDataSet:
A fluid.dataset~ to contain the new cluster-distance space.

div.p: Given a trained object, return the cluster ID for a data point in a buffer~

ul.li:
buffer:
A buffer~ containing a data point.

div.p: Given a trained object, return the distance of the provided point to each cluster. Both points are handled as buffer~
Run fluid.kmeans#*fit~ and fluid.kmeans#*transform~ in a single pass: i.e. train the model on the incoming fluid.dataset~ and then return its cluster-distance space in the destination fluid.dataset~

ul.li:
srcDataSet:
A fluid.dataset~ containing the data to fit and transform.

dstDataSet:
A fluid.dataset~ to contain the new cluster-distance space.

div.p: Given a trained object, retrieve the means (centroids) of each cluster as a fluid.dataset~

ul.li:
dataSet:
A fluid.dataset~ of clusers with a mean per column.

div.p: Overwrites the means (centroids) of each cluster, and declare the object trained.

ul.li:
dataSet:
A fluid.dataset~ of clusers with a mean per column.

div.p: Run fluid.kmeans#*fit~ and fluid.kmeans#*predict~ in a single pass: i.e. train the model on the incoming fluid.dataset~ and then return the learned clustering to the passed fluid.labelset~

ul.li:
dataSet:
A fluid.dataset~ containing the data to fit and predict.

labelSet:
A fluid.labelset~ to retrieve the predicted clusters.

div.p: The number of columns (dimensions) in this model or dataset / labeset
Reset the object status to not fitted and untrained.
The number of data points (entries / observations) in this model or dataset / labeset

method.name: load
method.description: Replace the internal state of the object from a dict. The message should take the form load dictionary <dictid>

method.name: dump
method.digest: Dump the state of this object from the dump outlet as a dict.

method.name: write
method.description: Save the internal state of the object to a JSON file on disk. With no argument, a file dialog will appear to choose the file.

method.name: read
method.description: Replace the internal state of the object from a JSON file on disk. With no argument, a file dialog will appear to choose the file.

div.p: The maximum number of iterations the algorithm will use whilst fitting.
The number of clusters to classify data into.
Enable warnings to be issued whenever a parameter value is constrained (e.g. clipped)
